BOND_DETAIL.RETURNS_CALCULATOR_DESC: Enter amount you would like to invest or units you would like to buy to know your returns.
BOND_DETAIL.INTEREST_INFO: Total Interest Amount you will earn on the bond if you will hold the bond till maturity.
BOND_DETAIL.TOTAL_RETURNS_INFO: Total Returns = Interest + Principal You have Invested
BOND_DETAIL.CONFIRM_INVESTMENT_SUBTITLE: Enter either amount or units to get more details.
BOND_DETAIL.VERIFYING_KYC_CONTENT: Your KYC is under process. You can start investing once the KYC is verified.
BOND_DETAIL.VERIFYING_KYC_NEXT_LINE: Meanwhile, you can add this bond to your watchlist.
BOND_DETAIL.EXPLORE_MORE_MSG: Meanwhile, you can explore more bonds.

FUNDAMENTAL_DETAIL.COUPON_RATE_INFO: Rate of interest paid by the bond's issuer on the bond's Face Value (FV).
FUNDAMENTAL_DETAIL.MIN_INVESTMENT_INFO: Minimum amount (in Rs.) you can invest in the bond.
FUNDAMENTAL_DETAIL.YIELD_INFO: Yield is the all-in return you will realize on the bond if you hold the bond till maturity.
FUNDAMENTAL_DETAIL.MATURITY_INFO: Maturity is the date on which the bond will mature, and you will get your principal investment back.
